metadata.title: CVE-2020-15365 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: LibRaw before 0.20-Beta3 has an out-of-bounds write in parse_exif() inmetadata\exif_gps.cpp via an unrecognized AtomName and a zero value oftiff_nifds.

criterions.comment: darktable package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
